sentence: A video of GOP Georgia gubernatorial candidate Kandiss Taylor appearing to denounce separation of church and state has been viewed more than 670,000 times on Twitter.
author: Andrew Stanton
title: GOP Candidate Says 'We Are the Church and We Run the State' in Viral Video

sentence: A video of GOP Georgia gubernatorial candidate Kandiss Taylor appearing to denounce separation of church and state has been viewed more than 670,000 times on Twitter.
author: Andrew Stanton
title: GOP Candidate Says 'We Are the Church and We Run the State' in Viral Video

sentence: Georgia's Republican gubernatorial candidate Kandiss Taylor said that she will launch a plan to take on the "Satanic elites," which she previously described as a "Luciferian regime."
author: Jason Lemon
title: GOP Governor Candidate Takes Aim at 'Luciferian Regime,' 'Satanic Elites'
